column1: Here are the 9 daily verses from the book of Nehemiah in CSV format:

column3: The words of Nehemiah the son of Hachaliah. And it came to pass in the month Chisleu, in the twentieth year, as I was in Shushan the palace,
That Hanani, one of my brethren, came, he and certain men of Judah; and I asked them concerning the Jews that had escaped, which were left of the captivity, and concerning Jerusalem.

Then Eliashib the high priest rose up with his brethren the priests, and they builded the sheep gate; they sanctified it, and set up the doors of it; even unto the tower of Meah they sanctified it, unto the tower of Hananeel.
So the wall was finished in the twenty and fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty and two days.
Also they reported his good deeds before me, and uttered my words to him: and Tobiah sent letters to put me in fear.
My God, think thou upon Tobiah and Sanballat according to these their works, and on the prophetess Noadiah, and the rest of the prophets, that would have put me in fear.

Benson and his brethren built the gate, with the houses round about it: he set up the doors thereof, and the locks, and the bars, and the two towers, and covered it with wood, and made it strong and stable.
Nehemiah said, Then I consulted with myself, and I rebuked the nobles, and the rulers, and said unto them, Ye exact usury, every one of his brother. And I set a great assembly against them,

And for the wood offering, at times, and according to the commandments, on the sabbaths, and on the new moons, and on the solemn feasts, and to bear the burdens of the house of our God which is upon us, according to our fathers’ houses, when also we were sanctified, all the seventh day, to take up the shekels of silver and of the store of first-fruits:
